general.title: General Information
general.q1: What is the Smart Service Robot?
general.a1: The Smart Service Robot is an interactive system designed to facilitate services such as food and beverage ordering, directions, and information access around the campus.
general.q2: How can I use this system?
general.a2: You can start by selecting the service you need from the main menu. Step-by-step guidance is available for each service.
general.q3: Which languages does the system support?
general.a3: The system currently supports English and Turkish. You can select your preferred language from the options at the top of the screen.

services.title: Services
services.q1: How can I track my order after placing it?
services.a1: After placing your order, you can check its status in the 'Order Tracking' section using the order number provided to you.
services.a2: You can make payments using a credit card, debit card, campus card, or cash. Online payments are processed securely.

technical.title: Technical Support
technical.q1: What should I do if the system is not working?
technical.a1: Please click the 'Technical Support' button at the bottom of the screen to report the issue or contact our support team at +90 232 488 8000.
technical.q2: How does the voice command feature work?
technical.a2: You can activate the voice command mode by clicking on the microphone icon in the upper right corner of the screen. Then you can speak your desired service.
technical.q3: I found a bug in the system, how can I report it?
technical.a3: You can report bugs and suggestions by sending an email to support@iue.edu.tr. Your feedback is valuable for our system improvements.
